title: Constitutional Cryptography: Tech Workers' Democratic Defense Tools
description: Investigate how technology workers developed and deployed cryptographic tools specifically designed to protect democratic institutions and resist authoritarian surveillance during 2025.
research_areas: What specific cryptographic tools were developed by tech resistance groups?
Which tech companies saw internal employee resistance to government surveillance requests?
How did tech workers coordinate secure communications for democratic organizers?
What dates mark key releases of democratic defense technologies?
source_requirements: GitHub repositories, tech worker communications, software release dates, surveillance policy documents
pdf_source: Technology Worker Resistance and Constitutional Cryptography_ Tools for Democratic Resilience.pdf
